entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 05 March 2023
